description: Create a new open door issue.
permissions: Allowed for admins, members of the organization, or users with a membership on the organization's broker.
side_effects: Creates an open door issue. If status is set to reported, creates open door issue reported notifications for the organization's team memberships.
validation_notes: --description, --status, --organization, and --reported-by are required. --status must be one of: editing, reported, resolved. --organization must be Type|ID format (e.g. Broker|123). Organization type must be Broker, Customer, or Trucker. Reported-by must have a membership with the organization's broker. Organization must be accepting open door issues.

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Organization in Type|ID format (required, e.g. Broker|123)

flags.name: --reported-by
flags.validation: User must have a membership with the organization's broker.
